ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: The various separated teams of Joes in Sierra Gordo are finally reunited. Back at the Pit Snake-Eyes and Scarlett run a series of surprise attacks, capturing numerous Vipers to throw the invading Cobras off their game.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 14:57:58. [CVDB445837] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:36:15. [Issue ID 1180301]
